findings.title: structuredClone()
findings.suggestion: Prefer structuredClone over deep-clone utilities; guard if targeting older browsers.

findings.title: structuredClone()
findings.suggestion: Prefer structuredClone over deep-clone utilities; guard if targeting older browsers.

findings.title: Web Share API
findings.suggestion: Guard: if (navigator.share) { await navigator.share(...) } else { fallback }

findings.title: URL.canParse()
findings.suggestion: Fallback: try/catch new URL(...) for validation.

findings.title: Popover attribute
findings.suggestion: Fallback: use <dialog> or a custom popover component.

findings.title: CSS :has()
findings.suggestion: Use progressive enhancement: avoid relying on :has() for critical UI; restructure selectors.

findings.title: CSS Container Queries
findings.suggestion: Provide responsive fallbacks using media queries when container queries are unsupported.

findings.title: CSS oklch()/oklab() colors
findings.suggestion: Provide fallback colors or color-mix() alternatives when unsupported.
